[Home](../../) &gt; [@lattice/view](../) &gt; AddEventListener

## AddEventListener type

Type of the addEventListener helper returned by createAddEventListener

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AddEventListener = <K extends keyof HTMLElementEventMap>(event: K, handler: (event: HTMLElementEventMap[K]) => void, options?: boolean | AddEventListenerOptions) => (element: HTMLElement) => () => void;
```

## Example


```typescript
import type { AddEventListener } from '@lattice/view/helpers/addEventListener';

const on: AddEventListener = createAddEventListener(batch);

el('button').ref(
  on('click', (e) => {
    count(c => c + 1);
    loading(true);
    // Both updates batched into a single render
  })
)('Click me');
```
